ygData.subject: Re: Value What We Have
ygData.msgSnippet: Hrmm... I particularly value the breed part. Now that s something I can really get behind... and add the chat about alchohol... what more could a bard want?
ygData.messageBody:
Hrmm... I particularly value the "breed" part. Now that's something I can
really get behind... and add the chat about alchohol... what more could a
bard want?

-----Original Message-----
From: Bob Stewart [mailto:bstewart@...]
Sent: Wednesday, May 26, 1999 2:44 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: [eqbards] Value What We Have


From: Bob Stewart <bstewart@...>

Fellow bards,

I am (or was) subscribed to two EverQuest mailing lists, this one and the
one also at OneList for Veeshan. I have incoming mail from both sorted
into an EverQuest folder. I received a relatively inane message amongst
the talk here and started to respond but realized it was from the veeshan
list rather than this one. It was followed by even more inanity from that
list.

I unsubscribed from veeshan and decided I should compliment those on this
list for the quality and content of the discussion. Bards are indeed a
breed apart.

Bob
Thrush of Norrath's Veeshan Aspect
